name: Axl & Tuna
summary:
Axl & Tuna is a humorous take on the endless runner, featuring beautiful animations, family-friendly humor, and hours of entertainment.
Go beyond the tap-tap! Discover unparalleled jumps, catching air, fast free falls and forward/backward flips all at your fingertips!
Help Axl chase lost Fuzzbot in the Fuzzbot Factory. Beat your daily best scores for the number of Fuzzbots collected, distance covered, and tricks performed.
New day? You play on a completely new track!
